entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in the story. He is reluctant to take ownership of Kreacher.

entities.name: kreacher
entities.description: Kreacher is a house-elf who has been living at the Headquarters of the Order of the Phoenix for the past year. He is being considered for ownership by Harry.

entities.name: bellatrix lestrange
entities.description: Bellatrix Lestrange is a person mentioned in the story as someone who might take ownership of Kreacher if Harry does not.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is a person in the story who gives advice to Harry about what to do with Kreacher.

relationships.description: Harry has the option of taking ownership of Kreacher, but is reluctant to do so.
Dumbledore gives advice to Harry about what to do with Kreacher.
